title: religion change
body:
Hi :) 
i'm come from Vietnam and play League over Vietnam for a long time, i just transfer to US for a week and i really want to play league over US, but i can't change the religion and i spent a lot of time and money in league over Vietnam, i'm also Gold V, is there anything that i can change my account to US ? please help me ;({{champion:32}}

replies.body: You aren't able to transfer an account from Vietnam to the US as Garena runs the game in Vietnam.
i tried to contact Riot about it and they haven't reply, i'm really hope that i can change :(

Unfortunately, as Garena operates League for Vietnam, we won't have access to their system or have the ability to transfer your account to a Riot-operated Region. 

Full details on what regions can and cannot be transferred in Riot regions is covered in our [Account Transfer FAQ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751924-Account-Transfer-FAQ). Let me know if you have any questions.

is there any possible way or i just leave my VietNam account and since i came here the ping over Vietnam is way too high for me to play and i just don't want to waste my money and time, i play league in Vietnam since the Taipei won the world, i got a lot of skin also, this make me very sad..............{{champion:32}}

There's no possible way to transfer your account to NA, no. :(

You'll have to either play on the Vietnam server with higher latency or continue to build up an NA account.

If you have any other questions, please let me know.
road from begining to gold over NA then :)
